column4: Hello all.  I've finally ditched windows for linux and I am using Ubuntu, but I have been having thought of moving to another distro.  I like Ubuntu, but I want to make sure I am using the best distro with the best support.  Can anyone talk me out of changing?
the best distro is the one you feel comfortable with.. go with what works for you
by all means.. try the alternatives too.. it's always best to make an educated choice
